title: Comfytemp 3D Contoured Shoulder Ice Pack Wrap, Reusable Hot & Cold Gel Pack for Frozen Shoulder Pain, Rotator Cuff Injuries, Surgery Recovery & Muscle Soreness, Microwavable Arm Compression Sleeve
features: 3D Ergonomic Design: Experience targeted relief with our shoulder ice pack wrap, designed with a unique 3D wrap to contour seamlessly to your body's natural curves. This innovative design ensures a snug, comfortable fit, and even temperature distribution, providing optimal heat or cold therapy for an enhanced, more effective treatment experience. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to soothing, personalized relief.

Targeted Shoulder Pain Relief: Relieve shoulder discomfort with our specially designed gel pack, crafted to target pain and inflammation at the source. Whether you're suffering from rotator cuff injuries, tendonitis, frozen shoulder, or general muscle strain, our shoulder hot cold pack provides soothing hot or cold therapy to ease tension and promote healing. Enjoy fast, effective relief from chronic pain, stiffness, and inflammation with every use.

Hot & Cold Application: Our shoulder gel pack offers both cold and heat options to provide personalized relief. For cold therapy, simply refrigerate the gel pack for at least one hour to reduce swelling and numb pain. For heat therapy, use the microwave in 20-second intervals until the desired temperature is reached, allowing you to relax and soothe sore muscles. Experience the perfect balance of comfort and convenience for your shoulder pain relief.

2 Adjustable Compression Straps: Our shoulder brace wrap features two adjustable straps for customizable compression. The shoulder strap comfortably fits chest sizes from 27" to 47", while the arm strap fits arm circumferences from 12" to 20". For those with arm circumferences over 15", we recommend cutting the built-in arm strap for a more tailored fit. These adjustable features ensure a secure and supportive experience, enhancing comfort and optimizing your therapy for effective pain relief.

Durable & Leak-Proof: Our product is meticulously crafted for lasting durability, featuring strong double-edged stitching to ensure leak-proof performance. The evenly distributed gel provides consistent and thorough cold therapy, maximizing the effectiveness of the ice pack. With Comfytemp's high-quality solution, you can confidently bid farewell to discomfort and embrace a life free from pain and inconvenience.
description: Product Description Relieve shoulder discomfort with our specially designed gel pack, crafted to target pain and inflammation at the source.
